test.name: Add products to Cart and verify the cart

kw.name: Open browser and install add_extension to block the ads
kw.doc: Since we are automating a website which is published in the internet, and the website contains ads like in any normal websites. The ads blocks the flow of automation. So to avoid this, a browser extension is used which blocks the ads in the website. crx file is used here that installs the adblock extension on every browser opened.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//*[contains(text(),'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers')]' is displayed.
